name: Designli
description:
Transformative By Design. Designli is a digital product studio in Greenville, South Carolina.
We specialize in the rapid prototyping of new software concepts, taking our clients from vision to 'V1' as quickly and effectively as possible.
Startups and entrepreneurs value our process for its key 'pausing points' along the way, as we help founders seek validation, feedback, and - oftentimes - investment.

Established businesses lean on Designli when launching new, software-driven initiatives for many of these same reasons, seeking internal buy-in while iterating quickly based on customer feedback.
For more information and to see our extensive work portfolio, visit https://designli.co
